channel.title: [NEW!] RuneScape Stats Grabber v.2 by Ron
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=15pt]RuneScape Stat Grabber v.2 by Ron [Form][/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
If you download this, please tell me about it by commenting on this thread. Thank you. :) Happy New Year!
Features: (3100 Lines of code!!!) [COLOR=Blue] * Accurately gets real time statistics of username. After you logout of RuneScape. * Ability to compare statistics with another username. * Able to save the stats or compared stats to an HTML or INI file. * Able to view saved HTML and INI files. * Can copy all statistics to your clip board so you can paste your stats on a forum or instant message or something. * Ability to see how much exp you need to get to your next lvl. * Easy to report a bug or suggest a feature. * Able to colorize exp to next lvl if less than a value that you can set. * Able to load stats and/or compare stats on startup. * Compiles in about 150 msc. * Select a username previously searched for in the select box. * Add or delete as many player names as you want easily. Load users from a text file or save usernames to a text file. * Calculates combat and your combat class. 99% accurate. Any info? * To Do list for stuff you need to do. * Load stats from an INI file and if you load stats on both sides you can compare them. * Very easy to check for updates. * Any Exp calc to calculate, Exp Each Time, # of times, Total Exp! [/COLOR]
Picture: [img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/5544/statsgrabberux4.png[/img]
No bugs so far. :)
47 people downloaded this script before I added v.2 on Mopar forums. 19 people downloaded this script before I added v.2 on Villu forums.
~Ron

Memory leaks have been resolved, but not completely leak free. Though I will make it so by talking to devs and asking for help.

item.title: [NEW!] RuneScape Stats Grabber v.2 by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“Weibs, post:36, topic:28843”]Found a small bug with version .2, when you start it up for the first time, it asks for the save location, which is originally set to C:\RS Stats, but when you press ok, it adds another ‘’ to the end, making it C:\RS Stats\.

Otherwise this is freaking amazing![/quote]

That’s not a bug, I did that on purpose, just so nobody could mess up and forget the . I was going to make it look for a \ at the end and if it wasn’t there, then it would add it, but it had some problems, so I found it easier doing it this way, and the same out come occurs.

Thanks Weibs, you helped a bunch.

Next version I started today, and I found a problem. It’s a very hard bug to notice and if someone did notice it, no one would really care, but it’s still a bug and it’s there. And since I added a new feature and fixed that bug, I’ll run some more tests to see if it worked properly, call it version .21 cause of the fix and extra feature and upload it by next weekend probably.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW!] RuneScape Stats Grabber v.2 by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Uploading Version .2 right now!!!

Here are the features!

Features:
* Accurately gets real time statistics of username. After you
logout of RuneScape.
* Ability to compare statistics with another username.
* Able to save the stats or compared stats to an HTML or INI file.
* Able to view saved HTML and INI files.
* Can copy all statistics to your clip board so you can paste your
stats on a forum or instant message or something.
* Ability to see how much exp you need to get to your next lvl.
* Easy to report a bug or suggest a feature.
* Able to colorize exp to next lvl if less than a value that you
can set.
* Able to load stats and/or compare stats on startup.
* Compiles in about 150 msc.
* Select a username previously searched for in the select box.
* Add or delete as many player names as you want easily. Load
users from a text file or save usernames to a text file.
* Calculates combat and your combat class. 99% accurate. Any info?
* To Do list for stuff you need to do.
* Load stats from an INI file and if you load stats on both sides
you can compare them.
* Very easy to check for updates.
* Any Exp calc to calculate, Exp Each Time, # of times, Total Exp!

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW!] RuneScape Stats Grabber v.2 by Ron
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

No, I mean you enter the xp of something then it calculates how many times you need to do “something” to get to x level.

Not really a skill calculator, just an experience calculator.

Read full topic
item.source: [NEW!] RuneScape Stats Grabber v.2 by Ron

item.title: [NEW!] RuneScape Stats Grabber v.2 by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

The Un-Named:

Also, if it’s not too late, a simple calculator till next level, example would be enter the xp your gaining each action on a skill and it will tell you how many times you need to do it until a level. Pretty simple, but in reality it’s a stat calculator for every skill.

Hmm. Maybe, but I’m not sure. If I had to make a calculator for every skill, that would be a reaaaal pain! Not because of the work of building each and every form, but trying to implement it properly and keeping the compiling time down.

On this version, the compile time is around 50 msc. The next version has tons of features, and it’s about 90 msc, but a calculator for that many things, would make it like 5 seconds to load lol. I’m just trying to keep it simple.

However, I did add a Combat Calculator, I just need to find out how to make it so the calculator shows how many lvls you need in atk, str, def, range, mage, hitpoints, or prayer for the User to be at the next combat lvl and also, the combat calc is not completely accurate. It’s 99% accurate like other calculators and the most it’s ever been off is about .3 or .4.

Next version is coming soon. If I can finish my tests and studying and all, I’ll be able to finish version .2 by Sunday.

~Ron

Read full topic
